title: # 535 - Nathan Florence, Koa Rothman & ME
itunes:title: # 535 - Nathan Florence, Koa Rothman & ME
description:
Today, I sit down in Hawaii with professional surfers, Nathan Florence & Koa Rothman. We talk about line up hierarchy at the North Shore, surfing pipe for the first time, surf competitions, buying land in Hawaii, under rated surfers, and much more!  

 

Follow Nathan

Instagram: https://www.instagram.com/nathan_florence 

Youtube: https://www.youtube.com/c/NathanFlorence 

 

Follow Koa

Instagram: https://www.instagram.com/koarothman 

Youtube: https://www.youtube.com/c/KoaRothman
